summary: This bill, the Joint Reserve Detachment (JRD) Formalization Act (H.R. 3599), mandates the Secretary of Defense to establish and maintain a joint reserve detachment within the Defense Innovation Unit. It amends Title 10 of the United States Code, specifically Section 1766(a), by replacing "may establish" with "shall establish and maintain." The bill aims to formalize and potentially expand the role of the JRD.
